+++ This bug was initially created as a clone of Bug #555284 +++

When the server has trust anchors provided in its CertificateRequest, the chain building should attempt to send a chain that is rooted at those trust anchors.

More generally, all the problems that plague CERT_CertChainFromCert will affect this code.

My suggestion is to add a new interface for obtaining the client cert from the application, where the application would build the chain (probably using libpkix), and then hand the whole chain to libssl to be serialized into the client certificate message.
